original_title: 新任女教師 保健室のぬくもり
overview: An Eros drama depicting the forbidden love between a male student who gave up baseball because of a shoulder injury and a new public health teacher who couldn’t abandon his debt-ridden cohabiting partner. Upon meeting her new health teacher, Megumi, Tetsuya shares a secret with her.
title: Shin’nin jokyosh: Hoken-shitsu no nukumori
